column4: Can anybody mention benefits of Jeos (Minimal Virtual machine install)?
It's a minimal install. That means you can add what you need to it and you don't have to spend time trimming the stuff you don't need.

I have a jeos vm and it works fine but I had to install quite a few things to make it do what I wanted.  A more typical install would have already included most of the things I ended up having to install.
I heard that it is suited well when running on VMWare as it is made to run efficient on it
Yes, it's well suited for running under vmware.
